Original Requirements: Create a snake game in Python
Product Goals: Provide an engaging gaming experience with clear instructions.
Ensure smooth and responsive gameplay on various devices.
Implement visually appealing graphics to enhance player enjoyment.
User Stories: As a player, I want the snake to move automatically so that I can focus on controlling its direction.
As a player, I want to see my score increase as I eat food and grow longer.
As a player, I expect clear visual feedback when I collide with boundaries or myself.
Competitive Analysis: Snake Game A: Simple interface but lacks smooth animations
Snake.io: Multiplayer feature but complex UI for beginners
Classic Snake: No modern graphics and limited customization options

Requirement Pool: Implement grid-based game board with defined dimensions.
Initialize snake on the game board with a starting position and direction.
Add arrow key controls for snake movement, ensuring continuous motion.
Generate food at random positions avoiding snake's body.
Handle collisions with boundaries and the snake itself to trigger game over.
UI Design draft: A simple yet visually appealing interface featuring a grid-based board, clear snake and food icons, score display, and restart button.
